definition: surname Yin/abbr. for 印度[Yin4 du4]
to print/to mark/to engrave/a seal/a print/a stamp/a mark/a trace/image

sentences.english: I kind of broke the rules when I photocopied your file.
sentences.chinese: 我影印妳的檔案多少是違反規定的。

sentences.english: Publishers in Paris and New York had secretly received the manuscript on microfilm.
sentences.chinese: 巴黎和紐約的出版商祕密接收了收稿的影印膠捲。

sentences.english: How many photocopiers are in the room?
sentences.chinese: 在房間裏有多少臺影印機？

sentences.english: Most newsagents or post offices have a copying machine.
sentences.chinese: 大部分的郵局都有影印的服務。

sentences.english: Photocopies of the Original Tender minimise the risk of discrepancies.
sentences.chinese: 標書正本影印件能最大限度地減少差異的機率。

sentences.english: I also need to purchase a new photocopier.
sentences.chinese: 我還需要買一臺新的影印機。

sentences.english: The photocopier has been busy all morning.
Photocopy of this Entry Form is acceptable.
sentences.chinese: 歡迎使用本表格之影印本。

sentences.english: We don't provide a printed study guide.
sentences.chinese: 我們不提供影印的學習指南。

sentences.english: We are enclosing a photostatic copy of our letter dated June 2.
sentences.chinese: 隨函附加稅寄我們六月二日信函的影印件一份。

sentences.english: Please retain a photocopy for you and your employee's own records.
sentences.chinese: 請閣下與僱員各保留一份影印本作存檔之用。

sentences.english: Supplementary pages may be photocopied or copied and inserted if required.
sentences.chinese: 如要求，可以影印，複印或插入補充頁數。

sentences.english: In answer to my request, she photocopied the book for me.
sentences.chinese: 作爲響應我的要求，她爲我影印了這本書。

sentences.english: Photocopies of certificates etc. confirming qualifications, membership, etc.
sentences.chinese: 證書影印本，證明資格及會籍等。

sentences.english: This is to testify that the former photo-offset copy agrees with the true copy of the Bachelor's Degree Certificate.
sentences.chinese: 茲證明前影印件與《學士學位證書》的原件相符。

sentences.english: Mr Penny jokes about the scarcity of colour photocopiers .
sentences.chinese: 佩尼先生調侃館裏很缺彩色影印機。

definition: manuscript (of a book etc)/sketch (of a design etc)
to set in print/to diffuse/to publish
